Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at Damen/73rd
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 71st, Ashland and 74th due to, street blockage near Damen/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, 71st, Ashland and 74th due to, street blockage near Damen/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.
